summary: This bill, H.R. 3574, amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow qualified distributions from 529 plans (education savings plans) to cover transportation and parking expenses for eligible educational institutions. It expands the definition of qualified expenses to include reasonable costs for transportation and parking, up to the allowance determined by the educational institution. It also extends these provisions to expenses related to apprenticeship programs. The amendments apply to distributions made after the enactment of the Act.
